ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanoid reprogramming
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to craft AI chips at the machining table that allow you to repurpose destroyed mechanoids. Actual reprogramming will require further research.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: You can now create AI chips at the machining table. Perform further research to discover how to use it on different mechanoid types.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanoid control computer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to build a control computer that performs the thinking for your mechanoids for improved performance and more control.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: You have discovered how to build PAL, the benevolent self-learning computing unit. It allows you to keep your mechanoids at your base if required and lets them operate at much faster speeds with less down time.
